body:
oh hell. There's good story with good scenes, there's trash story with good scenes, then there's trash story with trash scenes.

But this one has really good art, but the story is insulting towards the trash and the scenes are not okay. I like me my trash ntr but if you like this one, you need help.
I like the way this artist draws breasts
no entendi, que alguien me explique
Whoa. A rape doujin where the girl doesn’t start enjoying it halfway through? Well how about that...
